name: Disk Usage
description: Monitors root filesystem usage and warns if usage exceeds 90%.
check_cmd: USAGE=$(df -P / | awk 'NR==2 {gsub("%", "", $5); print $5}'); if [ "$USAGE" -gt 90 ]; then echo fix; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: echo '⚠️  Disk usage above 90%. Clean up disk space manually or prune logs/Docker images.'
verify_cmd: USAGE=$(df -P / | awk 'NR==2 {gsub("%", "", $5); print $5}'); echo "Usage after check: ${USAGE}%"; if [ "$USAGE" -le 90 ]; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
